name: BotFightZero
description:
Zero Gravity Grenade Launcher Third Person Shooter (TPS).

This game is free, has no In-App purchases, and no ads.

Description
  • The ZeroG Launcher (Zero Gravity Grenade Launcher) weapon is designed to create a fair fight between the AI bot and human player. The grenade moves slow so you can dodge it and will bounce until it explodes on target.
  • Bots glow in proportion to their health.
Features
  • Bots: Red
  • Weapons: ZeroG Launcher (Zero Gravity Grenade Launcher)
  • AI bot strafing
  • AI bot sound FX
  • Ragdoll
  • Automatic doors
  • Maps: Lobby, End, Level 1-2
  • Input: Keyboard & Mouse
  • Frames per Second (FPS) counter.
Notes

I only packaged for 64-bit but if anyone needs 32-bit please let me know.

Dev
  • My Apps: BradAppList
  • YouTube Channel: Brad Code Tips
